_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeafMC
author: admin@micheal.cc
description: Leaf is a fork of Gale (itself a fork of Purpur) focused on fixing bugs and improving performance.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# LeafMC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=leaf
API_URL="https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/${PROJECT}"

cd /mnt/server

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g'))
else
    # 1. Resolve Version
    if [ -z "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" ] || [ "${MINECRAFT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
        echo -e "Resolving latest LeafMC version..."
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=$(curl -s ${API_URL} | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
    fi

    echo -e "Using Version: ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"

    # 2. Resolve Build
    if [ -z "${BUILD_NUMBER}" ] || [ "${BUILD_NUMBER}" == "latest" ]; then
        echo -e "Resolving latest build for ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}..."
        BUILD_NUMBER=$(curl -s ${API_URL}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
    fi

    echo -e "Using Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"

    # 3. Construct URL
    # Pattern: https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/leaf/versions/{ver}/builds/{build}/downloads/leaf-{ver}-{build}.jar
    DOWNLOAD_URL="${API_URL}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/leaf-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar"
fi

# 4. Download
echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
    mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# 5. Configs
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of Minecraft to download. 

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the .jar file to run the server with.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the LeafMC release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
